text:
As one of the educators who helped build the infant care programme at Mosaic Preschool, this has been a deeply personal and meaningful journey. Together with my colleague, we poured our hearts into every detail—from designing the environment to crafting a curriculum filled with love, rhythm, and purpose.

We wanted this space to feel like a second home, not just for the babies, but also for the educators working here—to give them a sense of rhythm, ritual, and respect in their daily care. A beautiful, inviting environment makes all the difference when you spend 8 to 24 hours a day in it.

It’s been a privilege to grow this precious project from the ground up, and I’m truly proud of the care and community we’ve created for every child and teacher who joins us.

Congratulations to Mosaic Infant Care on your one-year anniversary! We are incredibly grateful for the love, care, and dedication you’ve shown to our little one. Watching them grow and thrive under your guidance has been a joy. The nurturing and stimulating environment you’ve created truly stands out, and it’s evident that your educators put their hearts into everything they do.
We’re excited to continue this journey with you and look forward to creating more wonderful memories together. Thank you for being such an important part of our child’s development!
Kai Kai's father

My little one has been with Mosaic infant care for almost 10 months now. I have had the privilege to witness how much she has grown into an active, curious, confident and loving toddler with strong passion for learning under the care and love of a team of professional and driven teachers. Her bonding with teachers has always warmed my heart and I am sure she has formed so many sweet memories of her days in school. Wouldn't give a second thought recommending Mosaic to other parents :)

Mosaic is a well organised, clean preschool facility with good focus on safety and fun learning. The regular updates from teachers made us feel assured and connected to our little one’s daily experiences. Highly recommended.

Definitely recommend any branch of Mosaic preschool. My son had attended Bukit Timah branch which, unfortunately, had to close because of the building demolition. Eunos branch offers bilingual education, lots of indoor/outdoor activities which help a child to grow healthy.
